name: azure-functions-typescript-boilerplate
description: An Azure Functions with Typescript boilerplate

scripts.serve: tsc && cd src && func host start && rimraf **/*.js **/*.map
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --outDir dist --sourceMap false && copyfiles package.json dist && cd src && copyfiles host.json local.settings.json */function.json ../dist

author: Fernando Escolar <f.escolar@hotmail.com>
